H0.text: Which London theatre used to boast 'We Never Close'. National Theatre

H1.text: Which London theatre used to boast 'We Never Close'. Apollo Victoria Theatre

H2.text: Which London theatre used to boast 'We Never Close'. Palace Theatre

H3.text: Which London theatre used to boast 'We Never Close'. Windmill

A4.text: The theatre's famous motto 'We Never Closed' (often humorously modified to 'We Never Clothed') was a reference to the fact that the theatre remained open, apart from the compulsory closure that affected all theatres for 13 days (4 to 16 September) in 1939.
